column3: While it is clear that we need to make some adjustments to protect Social Security for the long term, it is disingenuous to say that the trust fund is facing a crisis.

Racial profiling punishes innocent individuals for the past actions of those who look and sound like them. It misdirects crucial resources and undercuts the trust needed between law enforcement and the communities they serve. It has no place in our national discourse, and no place in our nation's police departments.

'West Wing' was huge. Like 'Hamilton,' it pulls back the curtain on how decision-making happens at the highest level, or at least how you hope it would be. The amount of information Aaron Sorkin packs into a scene gave me this courage to trust the audience to keep up.
In every tyrant's heart there springs in the end this poison, that he cannot trust a friend.
Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel.
Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
Trust your instinct to the end, though you can render no reason.
You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
Seize the day, and put the least possible trust in tomorrow.
Trust not too much to appearances.
Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!
Only trust thyself, and another shall not betray thee.
Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers.
Trust in what you love, continue to do it, and it will take you where you need to go.

Trust should be the basis for all our moral training.
